00157   template <typename T>
00158     int Mpi_Allgatherv(T* sendBuf, int sendCount, T* recvBuf, 
00159         int* recvCounts, int* displs, MPI_Comm comm) {
00160 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00161       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00162 #endif
00163       PROF_PAR_ALLGATHERV_BEGIN
00164 
00165 #ifdef __USE_A2A_FOR_MPI_ALLGATHER__
00166 
00167         int maxSendCount;
00168       int npes, rank;
00169 
00170       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00171       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00172 
00173       par::Mpi_Allreduce<int>(&sendCount, &maxSendCount, 1, MPI_MAX, comm);
00174 
00175       T* dummySendBuf = new T[maxSendCount*npes];
00176       assert(dummySendBuf);
00177 
00178       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00179         for(int j = 0; j < sendCount; j++) {
00180           dummySendBuf[(i*maxSendCount) + j] = sendBuf[j];
00181         }
00182       }
00183 
00184       T* dummyRecvBuf = new T[maxSendCount*npes];
00185       assert(dummyRecvBuf);
00186 
00187       par::Mpi_Alltoall<T>(dummySendBuf, dummyRecvBuf, maxSendCount, comm);
00188 
00189       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00190         for(int j = 0; j < recvCounts[i]; j++) {
00191           recvBuf[displs[i] + j] = dummyRecvBuf[(i*maxSendCount) + j];
00192         }
00193       }
00194 
00195       delete [] dummySendBuf;
00196       delete [] dummyRecvBuf;
00197 
00198 #else
00199 
00200       MPI_Allgatherv(sendBuf, sendCount, par::Mpi_datatype<T>::value(),
00201           recvBuf, recvCounts, displs, par::Mpi_datatype<T>::value(), comm);
00202 
00203 #endif
00204 
00205       PROF_PAR_ALLGATHERV_END
00206     }

00208   template <typename T>
00209     int Mpi_Allgather(T* sendBuf, T* recvBuf, int count, MPI_Comm comm) {
00210 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00211       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00212 #endif
00213       PROF_PAR_ALLGATHER_BEGIN
00214

00216 
00217         int npes;
00218       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00219       T* dummySendBuf = new T[count*npes];
00220       assert(dummySendBuf);
00221       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00222         for(int j = 0; j < count; j++) {
00223           dummySendBuf[(i*count) + j] = sendBuf[j];
00224         }
00225       }
00226       par::Mpi_Alltoall<T>(dummySendBuf, recvBuf, count, comm);
00227       delete [] dummySendBuf;
00228 
00229 #else
00230 
00231       MPI_Allgather(sendBuf, count, par::Mpi_datatype<T>::value(), 
00232           recvBuf, count, par::Mpi_datatype<T>::value(), comm);
00233 
00234 #endif
00235 
00236       PROF_PAR_ALLGATHER_END
00237     }

00239   template <typename T>
00240     int Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse(T* sendbuf, int* sendcnts, int* sdispls, 
00241         T* recvbuf, int* recvcnts, int* rdispls, MPI_Comm comm) {
00242 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00243       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00244 #endif
00245       PROF_PAR_ALL2ALLV_SPARSE_BEGIN
00246 
00247         int npes, rank;
00248       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00249       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00250 
00251       int commCnt = 0;
00252 
00253       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00254         if(sendcnts[i] > 0) {
00255           commCnt++;
00256         }
00257         if(recvcnts[i] > 0) {
00258           commCnt++;
00259         }
00260       }
00261 
00262       for(int i = (rank+1); i < npes; i++) {
00263         if(sendcnts[i] > 0) {
00264           commCnt++;
00265         }
00266         if(recvcnts[i] > 0) {
00267           commCnt++;
00268         }
00269       }
00270 
00271       MPI_Request* requests = new MPI_Request[commCnt];
00272       assert(requests);
00273 
00274       MPI_Status* statuses = new MPI_Status[commCnt];
00275       assert(statuses);
00276 
00277       commCnt = 0;
00278 
00279       //First place all recv requests. Do not recv from self.
00280       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00281         if(recvcnts[i] > 0) {
00282           par::Mpi_Irecv<T>( &(recvbuf[rdispls[i]]) , recvcnts[i], i, 1,
00283               comm, &(requests[commCnt]) );
00284           commCnt++;
00285         }
00286       }
00287 
00288       for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
00289         if(recvcnts[i] > 0) {
00290           par::Mpi_Irecv<T>( &(recvbuf[rdispls[i]]) , recvcnts[i], i, 1,
00291               comm, &(requests[commCnt]) );
00292           commCnt++;
00293         }
00294       }
00295 
00296       //Next send the messages. Do not send to self.
00297       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00298         if(sendcnts[i] > 0) {
00299           par::Mpi_Issend<T>( &(sendbuf[sdispls[i]]), sendcnts[i], i, 1,
00300               comm, &(requests[commCnt]) );
00301           commCnt++;
00302         }
00303       }
00304 
00305       for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
00306         if(sendcnts[i] > 0) {
00307           par::Mpi_Issend<T>( &(sendbuf[sdispls[i]]), sendcnts[i], 
00308               i, 1, comm, &(requests[commCnt]) );
00309           commCnt++;
00310         }
00311       }
00312 
00313       //Now copy local portion.
00314 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
00315       assert(sendcnts[rank] == recvcnts[rank]);
00316 #endif
00317 
00318       for(int i = 0; i < sendcnts[rank]; i++) {
00319         recvbuf[rdispls[rank] + i] = sendbuf[sdispls[rank] + i];
00320       }
00321 
00322       PROF_A2AV_WAIT_BEGIN
00323 
00324         MPI_Waitall(commCnt, requests, statuses);
00325 
00326       PROF_A2AV_WAIT_END
00327 
00328         delete [] requests;
00329       delete [] statuses;
00330 
00331       PROF_PAR_ALL2ALLV_SPARSE_END
00332     }
00333 
00334   template <typename T>
00335     int Mpi_Alltoallv_dense(T* sendbuf, int* sendcnts, int* sdispls, 
00336         T* recvbuf, int* recvcnts, int* rdispls, MPI_Comm comm) {
00337 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00338       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00339 #endif
00340       PROF_PAR_ALL2ALLV_DENSE_BEGIN
00341 
00342         int npes, rank;
00343       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00344       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00345 
00346       //Processors may send a lot of information to themselves and a lesser
00347       //amount to others. If so, we don't want to waste communication by
00348       //including the local copy size in the max message size. 
00349       int maxNumElemSend = 0;
00350       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00351         if(sendcnts[i] > maxNumElemSend) {
00352           maxNumElemSend = sendcnts[i];
00353         }
00354       }
00355 
00356       for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
00357         if(sendcnts[i] > maxNumElemSend) {
00358           maxNumElemSend = sendcnts[i];
00359         }
00360       }
00361 
00362       int allToAllCount;
00363       par::Mpi_Allreduce<int>(&maxNumElemSend, &allToAllCount, 1, MPI_MAX, comm);
00364 
00365       T* tmpSendBuf = new T[allToAllCount*npes];
00366       assert(tmpSendBuf);
00367 
00368       T* tmpRecvBuf = new T[allToAllCount*npes];
00369       assert(tmpRecvBuf);
00370 
00371       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00372         for(int j = 0; j < sendcnts[i]; j++) {
00373           tmpSendBuf[(allToAllCount*i) + j] = sendbuf[sdispls[i] + j];            
00374         }
00375       }
00376 
00377       for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
00378         for(int j = 0; j < sendcnts[i]; j++) {
00379           tmpSendBuf[(allToAllCount*i) + j] = sendbuf[sdispls[i] + j];            
00380         }
00381       }
00382 
00383       par::Mpi_Alltoall<T>(tmpSendBuf, tmpRecvBuf, allToAllCount, comm);
00384 
00385       for(int i = 0; i < rank; i++) {
00386         for(int j = 0; j < recvcnts[i]; j++) {
00387           recvbuf[rdispls[i] + j] = tmpRecvBuf[(allToAllCount*i) + j];      
00388         }
00389       }
00390 
00391       //Now copy local portion.
00392 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
00393       assert(sendcnts[rank] == recvcnts[rank]);
00394 #endif
00395 
00396       for(int j = 0; j < recvcnts[rank]; j++) {
00397         recvbuf[rdispls[rank] + j] = sendbuf[sdispls[rank] + j];      
00398       }
00399 
00400       for(int i = (rank + 1); i < npes; i++) {
00401         for(int j = 0; j < recvcnts[i]; j++) {
00402           recvbuf[rdispls[i] + j] = tmpRecvBuf[(allToAllCount*i) + j];      
00403         }
00404       }
00405 
00406       delete [] tmpSendBuf;
00407       delete [] tmpRecvBuf;
00408 
00409       PROF_PAR_ALL2ALLV_DENSE_END
00410     }

00417   template <typename T> 
00418     int scatterValues(std::vector<T> & in, std::vector<T> & out, 
00419         DendroIntL outSz, MPI_Comm comm ) {
00420 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00421       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00422 #endif
00423       PROF_PAR_SCATTER_BEGIN
00424 
00425         int rank, npes;
00426 
00427       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00428       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00429 
00430       MPI_Request request;
00431       MPI_Status status;
00432 
00433       DendroIntL inSz = in.size();
00434       out.resize(outSz);
00435 
00436       DendroIntL off1 = 0, off2 = 0;
00437       DendroIntL * scnIn = NULL;
00438       if(inSz) {  
00439         scnIn = new DendroIntL [inSz]; 
00440         assert(scnIn);
00441       }
00442 
00443       // perform a local scan first ...
00444       DendroIntL zero = 0;
00445       if(inSz) {
00446         scnIn[0] = 1;
00447         for (DendroIntL i = 1; i < inSz; i++) {
00448           scnIn[i] = scnIn[i-1] + 1;
00449         }//end for
00450         // now scan with the final members of 
00451         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>(scnIn+inSz-1, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
00452       } else{
00453         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>(&zero, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
00454       }
00455 
00456       // communicate the offsets ...
00457       if (rank < (npes-1)){
00458         par::Mpi_Issend<DendroIntL>( &off1, 1, (rank + 1), 0, comm, &request );
00459       }
00460       if (rank){
00461         par::Mpi_Recv<DendroIntL>( &off2, 1, (rank - 1), 0, comm, &status );
00462       } else{
00463         off2 = 0; 
00464       }
00465 
00466       // add offset to local array
00467       for (DendroIntL i = 0; i < inSz; i++) {
00468         scnIn[i] = scnIn[i] + off2;  // This has the global scan results now ...
00469       }//end for
00470 
00471       //Gather Scan of outCnts
00472       DendroIntL *outCnts;
00473       outCnts = new DendroIntL[npes];
00474       assert(outCnts);
00475 
00476       if(rank < (npes-1)) {
00477         MPI_Status statusWait;
00478         MPI_Wait(&request,&statusWait);
00479       }
00480 
00481       if( outSz ) {
00482         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>( &outSz, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
00483       }else {
00484         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>( &zero, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
00485       }
00486 
00487       par::Mpi_Allgather<DendroIntL>( &off1, outCnts, 1, comm);
00488 
00489       int * sendSz = new int [npes];
00490       assert(sendSz);
00491 
00492       int * recvSz = new int [npes];
00493       assert(recvSz);
00494 
00495       int * sendOff = new int [npes];
00496       assert(sendOff);
00497 
00498       int * recvOff = new int [npes];
00499       assert(recvOff);
00500 
00501       // compute the partition offsets and sizes so that All2Allv can be performed.
00502       // initialize ...
00503       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00504         sendSz[i] = 0;
00505       }
00506 
00507       //The Heart of the algorithm....
00508       //scnIn and outCnts are both sorted 
00509       DendroIntL inCnt = 0;
00510       int pCnt = 0;
00511       while( (inCnt < inSz) && (pCnt < npes) ) {
00512         if( scnIn[inCnt] <= outCnts[pCnt]  ) {
00513           sendSz[pCnt]++;
00514           inCnt++;
00515         }else {
00516           pCnt++;
00517         }
00518       }
00519 
00520       // communicate with other procs how many you shall be sending and get how
00521       // many to recieve from whom.
00522       par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendSz, recvSz, 1, comm);
00523 
00524       int nn=0; // new value of nlSize, ie the local nodes.
00525       for (int i=0; i<npes; i++) {
00526         nn += recvSz[i];
00527       }
00528 
00529       // compute offsets ...
00530       sendOff[0] = 0;
00531       recvOff[0] = 0;
00532       for (int i=1; i<npes; i++) {
00533         sendOff[i] = sendOff[i-1] + sendSz[i-1];
00534         recvOff[i] = recvOff[i-1] + recvSz[i-1];
00535       }
00536 
00537       assert(static_cast<unsigned int>(nn) == outSz);
00538       // perform All2All  ... 
00539       T* inPtr = NULL;
00540       T* outPtr = NULL;
00541       if(!in.empty()) {
00542         inPtr = &(*(in.begin()));
00543       }
00544       if(!out.empty()) {
00545         outPtr = &(*(out.begin()));
00546       }
00547       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<T>(inPtr, sendSz, sendOff, 
00548           outPtr, recvSz, recvOff, comm);
00549 
00550       // clean up...
00551       if(scnIn) {
00552         delete [] scnIn;
00553         scnIn = NULL;
00554       }
00555 
00556       delete [] outCnts;
00557       outCnts = NULL;
00558 
00559       delete [] sendSz;
00560       sendSz = NULL;
00561 
00562       delete [] sendOff;
00563       sendOff = NULL;
00564 
00565       delete [] recvSz;
00566       recvSz = NULL;
00567 
00568       delete [] recvOff;
00569       recvOff = NULL;
00570 
00571       PROF_PAR_SCATTER_END
00572     }
00573 
00574 
00575   template<typename T>
00576     int concatenate(std::vector<T> & listA, std::vector<T> & listB,
00577         MPI_Comm comm) {
00578 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00579       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00580 #endif
00581       PROF_PAR_CONCAT_BEGIN
00582 
00583         int rank;
00584       int npes;
00585 
00586       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00587       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00588 
00589       assert(!(listA.empty()));
00590 
00591       //1. First perform Allreduce to get total listA size
00592       //and total listB size; 
00593 
00594       DendroIntL locAsz_locBsz[2];
00595       DendroIntL globAsz_globBsz[2];
00596 
00597       locAsz_locBsz[0] = listA.size();
00598       locAsz_locBsz[1] = listB.size();
00599       globAsz_globBsz[0] = 0;
00600       globAsz_globBsz[1] = 0;
00601 
00602       par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(locAsz_locBsz, globAsz_globBsz, 2, MPI_SUM, comm);
00603 
00604       //2. Re-distribute A and B independently so that
00605       //B is distributed only on the high rank processors
00606       //and A is distribute only on the low rank processors.
00607 
00608       DendroIntL avgTotalSize = ((globAsz_globBsz[0] + globAsz_globBsz[1])/npes);
00609 
00610       //since listA is not empty on any of the active procs,
00611       //globASz > npes so avgTotalSize >= 1
00612 
00613       DendroIntL remTotalSize = ((globAsz_globBsz[0] + globAsz_globBsz[1])%npes);
00614 
00615       int numSmallProcs = (npes - remTotalSize);
00616 
00617       //In the final merged list, there will be exactly remTotalSize number
00618       //of processors each having (avgTotalSize + 1) elements and there will
00619       //be exactly numSmallProcs number of processors each having
00620       //avgTotalSize elements. 
00621       //Also, len(A) + len(B) = (numSmallProcs*avg) + (remTotalSize*(avg+1))
00622 
00623       std::vector<T> tmpA;
00624       std::vector<T> tmpB;
00625 
00626       int numAhighProcs;
00627       int numAlowProcs;
00628       int numBothProcs;
00629       int numBhighProcs;
00630       int numBlowProcs;
00631       DendroIntL aSizeForBoth;
00632       DendroIntL bSizeForBoth;
00633 
00634       if( globAsz_globBsz[1] <= (numSmallProcs*avgTotalSize) ) {
00635         numBhighProcs = 0;
00636         numBlowProcs = ((globAsz_globBsz[1])/avgTotalSize); 
00637         bSizeForBoth = ((globAsz_globBsz[1])%avgTotalSize);
00638 
00639         assert(numBlowProcs <= numSmallProcs);
00640 
00641         //remBsize is < avgTotalSize. So it will fit on one proc.
00642         if(bSizeForBoth) {
00643           numBothProcs = 1;
00644           if(numBlowProcs < numSmallProcs) {
00645             //We don't know if remTotalSize is 0 or not. 
00646             //So, let the common proc be a low proc.
00647             aSizeForBoth = (avgTotalSize - bSizeForBoth);
00648             numAhighProcs = remTotalSize;
00649             numAlowProcs = (numSmallProcs - (1 + numBlowProcs));
00650           } else {             
00651             //No more room for small procs. The common has to be a high proc.
00652             aSizeForBoth = ((avgTotalSize + 1) - bSizeForBoth);
00653             numAhighProcs = (remTotalSize - 1);
00654             numAlowProcs = 0;
00655           }
00656         } else {
00657           numBothProcs = 0;
00658           aSizeForBoth = 0;
00659           numAhighProcs = remTotalSize;
00660           numAlowProcs = (numSmallProcs - numBlowProcs);
00661         }
00662       } else {
00663         //Some B procs will have (avgTotalSize+1) elements
00664         DendroIntL numBusingAvgPlus1 = ((globAsz_globBsz[1])/(avgTotalSize + 1));
00665         DendroIntL remBusingAvgPlus1 = ((globAsz_globBsz[1])%(avgTotalSize + 1));
00666         if (numBusingAvgPlus1 <= remTotalSize) {
00667           //Each block can use (avg+1) elements each, since there will be some
00668           //remaining for A  
00669           numBhighProcs = numBusingAvgPlus1;
00670           numBlowProcs = 0;
00671           bSizeForBoth = remBusingAvgPlus1;
00672           if(bSizeForBoth) {
00673             numBothProcs = 1;
00674             if (numBhighProcs < remTotalSize) {
00675               //We don't know if numSmallProcs is 0 or not.
00676               //So, let the common proc be a high proc 
00677               aSizeForBoth = ((avgTotalSize + 1) - bSizeForBoth);
00678               numAhighProcs = (remTotalSize - (numBhighProcs + 1));
00679               numAlowProcs = numSmallProcs;
00680             } else {
00681               //No more room for high procs. The common has to be a low proc. 
00682               aSizeForBoth = (avgTotalSize - bSizeForBoth);
00683               numAhighProcs = 0;
00684               numAlowProcs = (numSmallProcs - 1);
00685             }
00686           } else {
00687             numBothProcs = 0;
00688             aSizeForBoth = 0;
00689             numAhighProcs = (remTotalSize - numBhighProcs);
00690             numAlowProcs = numSmallProcs;
00691           }
00692         } else {
00693           //Since numBusingAvgPlus1 > remTotalSize*(avg+1) 
00694           //=> len(B) > remTotalSize*(avg+1)
00695           //=> len(A) < numSmallProcs*avg
00696           //This is identical to the first case (except for 
00697           //the equality), with A and B swapped.
00698 
00699           assert( globAsz_globBsz[0] < (numSmallProcs*avgTotalSize) );
00700 
00701           numAhighProcs = 0;
00702           numAlowProcs = ((globAsz_globBsz[0])/avgTotalSize); 
00703           aSizeForBoth = ((globAsz_globBsz[0])%avgTotalSize);
00704 
00705           assert(numAlowProcs < numSmallProcs);
00706 
00707           //remAsize is < avgTotalSize. So it will fit on one proc.
00708           if(aSizeForBoth) {
00709             numBothProcs = 1;
00710             //We don't know if remTotalSize is 0 or not. 
00711             //So, let the common proc be a low proc.
00712             bSizeForBoth = (avgTotalSize - aSizeForBoth);
00713             numBhighProcs = remTotalSize;
00714             numBlowProcs = (numSmallProcs - (1 + numAlowProcs));
00715           } else {
00716             numBothProcs = 0;
00717             bSizeForBoth = 0;
00718             numBhighProcs = remTotalSize;
00719             numBlowProcs = (numSmallProcs - numAlowProcs);
00720           }
00721         }
00722       }
00723 
00724       assert((numAhighProcs + numAlowProcs + numBothProcs
00725             + numBhighProcs + numBlowProcs) == npes);
00726 
00727       assert((aSizeForBoth + bSizeForBoth) <= (avgTotalSize+1));
00728 
00729       if(numBothProcs) {
00730         assert((aSizeForBoth + bSizeForBoth) >= avgTotalSize);
00731       } else {
00732         assert(aSizeForBoth == 0); 
00733         assert(bSizeForBoth == 0); 
00734       }
00735 
00736       if((aSizeForBoth + bSizeForBoth) == (avgTotalSize + 1)) {
00737         assert((numAhighProcs + numBothProcs + numBhighProcs) == remTotalSize);
00738         assert((numAlowProcs + numBlowProcs) == numSmallProcs);
00739       } else {
00740         assert((numAhighProcs + numBhighProcs) == remTotalSize);
00741         assert((numAlowProcs + numBothProcs + numBlowProcs) == numSmallProcs);
00742       }
00743 
00744       //The partition is as follow:
00745       //1. numAhighProcs with (avg+1) elements each exclusively from A,
00746       //2. numAlowProcs with avg elements each exclusively from A
00747       //3. numBothProcs with aSizeForBoth elements from A and
00748       // bSizeForBoth elements from B
00749       //4. numBhighProcs with (avg+1) elements each exclusively from B.
00750       //5. numBlowProcs with avg elements each exclusively from B.
00751 
00752       if(rank < numAhighProcs) {
00753         par::scatterValues<T>(listA, tmpA, (avgTotalSize + 1), comm);
00754         par::scatterValues<T>(listB, tmpB, 0, comm);
00755       } else if (rank < (numAhighProcs + numAlowProcs)) {
00756         par::scatterValues<T>(listA, tmpA, avgTotalSize, comm);
00757         par::scatterValues<T>(listB, tmpB, 0, comm);
00758       } else if (rank < (numAhighProcs + numAlowProcs + numBothProcs)) {
00759         par::scatterValues<T>(listA, tmpA, aSizeForBoth, comm);
00760         par::scatterValues<T>(listB, tmpB, bSizeForBoth, comm);
00761       } else if (rank <
00762           (numAhighProcs + numAlowProcs + numBothProcs + numBhighProcs)) {
00763         par::scatterValues<T>(listA, tmpA, 0, comm);
00764         par::scatterValues<T>(listB, tmpB, (avgTotalSize + 1), comm);
00765       } else {
00766         par::scatterValues<T>(listA, tmpA, 0, comm);
00767         par::scatterValues<T>(listB, tmpB, avgTotalSize, comm);
00768       }
00769 
00770       listA = tmpA;
00771       listB = tmpB;
00772       tmpA.clear();
00773       tmpB.clear();
00774 
00775       //3. Finally do a simple concatenation A = A + B. If the previous step
00776       //was performed correctly, there will be atmost 1 processor, which has both
00777       //non-empty A and non-empty B. On other processors one of the two lists
00778       //will be empty
00779       if(listA.empty()) {
00780         listA = listB;
00781       } else {
00782         if(!(listB.empty())) {
00783           listA.insert(listA.end(), listB.begin(), listB.end());
00784         }
00785       }
00786 
00787       listB.clear();
00788 
00789       PROF_PAR_CONCAT_END
00790     }
00791 
00792   template <typename T>
00793     int maxLowerBound(const std::vector<T> & keys, const std::vector<T> & searchList,
00794         std::vector<T> & results, MPI_Comm comm) {
00795       PROF_SEARCH_BEGIN
00796 
00797         int rank, npes;
00798 
00799       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00800       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00801 
00802       // allocate memory for the mins array
00803       std::vector<T> mins (npes);
00804       assert(!searchList.empty());
00805 
00806       T* searchListPtr = NULL;
00807       T* minsPtr = NULL;
00808       if(!searchList.empty()) {
00809         searchListPtr = &(*(searchList.begin()));
00810       }
00811       if(!mins.empty()) {
00812         minsPtr = &(*(mins.begin()));
00813       }
00814       par::Mpi_Allgather<T>(searchListPtr, minsPtr, 1, comm);
00815 
00816       //For each key decide which processor to send to
00817       unsigned int *part = NULL;
00818 
00819       if(keys.size()) {
00820         part = new unsigned int[keys.size()];
00821         assert(part);
00822       }
00823 
00824       for ( unsigned int i=0; i<keys.size(); i++ ) {
00825         //maxLB returns the smallest index in a sorted array such
00826         //that a[ind] <= key and  a[index +1] > key
00827         bool found = par::maxLowerBound<T>(mins,keys[i], part+i,NULL,NULL);
00828         if ( !found ) {
00829           //This key is smaller than the mins from every processor.
00830           //No point in searching.
00831           part[i] = rank;
00832         }
00833       }
00834 
00835       mins.clear();
00836 
00837       int *numKeysSend = new int[npes];
00838       assert(numKeysSend);
00839 
00840       int *numKeysRecv = new int[npes];
00841       assert(numKeysRecv);
00842 
00843       for ( int i=0; i<npes; i++ ) {
00844         numKeysSend[i] = 0;
00845       }
00846 
00847       // calculate the number of keys to send ...
00848       for ( unsigned int i=0; i<keys.size(); i++ ) {
00849         numKeysSend[part[i]]++;
00850       }
00851 
00852       // Now do an All2All to get numKeysRecv
00853       par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(numKeysSend, numKeysRecv, 1, comm);
00854 
00855       unsigned int totalKeys=0; // total number of local keys ...
00856       for ( int i=0; i<npes; i++ ) {
00857         totalKeys += numKeysRecv[i];
00858       }
00859 
00860       // create the send and recv buffers ...
00861       std::vector<T> sendK (keys.size());
00862       std::vector<T> recvK (totalKeys);
00863 
00864       // the mapping ..
00865       unsigned int * comm_map = NULL;
00866 
00867       if(keys.size()) {
00868         comm_map = new unsigned int [keys.size()];
00869         assert(comm_map);
00870       }
00871 
00872       // Now create sendK
00873       int *sendOffsets = new int[npes]; 
00874       assert(sendOffsets);
00875       sendOffsets[0] = 0;
00876 
00877       int *recvOffsets = new int[npes]; 
00878       assert(recvOffsets);
00879       recvOffsets[0] = 0;
00880 
00881       int *numKeysTmp = new int[npes]; 
00882       assert(numKeysTmp);
00883       numKeysTmp[0] = 0; 
00884 
00885       // compute offsets ...
00886       for ( int i=1; i<npes; i++ ) {
00887         sendOffsets[i] = sendOffsets[i-1] + numKeysSend[i-1];
00888         recvOffsets[i] = recvOffsets[i-1] + numKeysRecv[i-1];
00889         numKeysTmp[i] = 0; 
00890       }
00891 
00892       for ( unsigned int i=0; i< keys.size(); i++ ) {
00893         unsigned int ni = numKeysTmp[part[i]];
00894         numKeysTmp[part[i]]++;
00895         // set entry ...
00896         sendK[sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni] = keys[i];
00897         // save mapping .. will need it later ...
00898         comm_map[i] = sendOffsets[part[i]] + ni;
00899       }
00900 
00901       if(part) {
00902         delete [] part;
00903       }
00904 
00905       assert(numKeysTmp);
00906       delete [] numKeysTmp;
00907       numKeysTmp = NULL;
00908 
00909       T* sendKptr = NULL;
00910       T* recvKptr = NULL;
00911       if(!sendK.empty()) {
00912         sendKptr = &(*(sendK.begin()));
00913       }
00914       if(!recvK.empty()) {
00915         recvKptr = &(*(recvK.begin()));
00916       }
00917 
00918       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<T>(sendKptr, numKeysSend, sendOffsets, 
00919           recvKptr, numKeysRecv, recvOffsets, comm);
00920 
00921 
00922       std::vector<T>  resSend (totalKeys);
00923       std::vector<T>  resRecv (keys.size());
00924 
00925       //Final local search.
00926       for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < totalKeys; i++) {
00927         unsigned int idx;
00928         bool found = par::maxLowerBound<T>( searchList, recvK[i], &idx,NULL,NULL );
00929         if(found) {
00930           resSend[i] = searchList[idx];
00931         }
00932       }//end for i
00933 
00934       //Exchange Results
00935       //Return what you received in the earlier communication.
00936       T* resSendPtr = NULL;
00937       T* resRecvPtr = NULL;
00938       if(!resSend.empty()) {
00939         resSendPtr = &(*(resSend.begin()));
00940       }
00941       if(!resRecv.empty()) {
00942         resRecvPtr = &(*(resRecv.begin()));
00943       }
00944       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<T>(resSendPtr, numKeysRecv, recvOffsets, 
00945           resRecvPtr, numKeysSend, sendOffsets, comm);
00946 
00947       assert(sendOffsets);
00948       delete [] sendOffsets;
00949       sendOffsets = NULL;
00950 
00951       assert(recvOffsets);
00952       delete [] recvOffsets;
00953       recvOffsets = NULL;
00954 
00955       assert(numKeysSend);
00956       delete [] numKeysSend;
00957       numKeysSend = NULL;
00958 
00959       assert(numKeysRecv);
00960       delete [] numKeysRecv;
00961       numKeysRecv = NULL;
00962 
00963       for ( unsigned int i=0; i < keys.size(); i++ ) {
00964         results[i] = resRecv[comm_map[i]];  
00965       }//end for
00966 
00967       // Clean up ...
00968       if(comm_map) {
00969         delete [] comm_map;
00970       }
00971 
00972       PROF_SEARCH_END
00973     }
00974 
00975   template<typename T>
00976     int partitionW(std::vector<T>& nodeList, unsigned int (*getWeight)(const T *), MPI_Comm comm){
00977 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
00978       MPI_Barrier(comm);
00979 #endif
00980       PROF_PARTW_BEGIN
00981 
00982         int npes;
00983 
00984       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
00985 
00986       if(npes == 1) {
00987         PROF_PARTW_END
00988       }
00989 
00990       if(getWeight == NULL) {
00991         getWeight = par::defaultWeight<T>;
00992       }
00993 
00994       int rank;
00995 
00996       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00997 
00998       MPI_Request request;
00999       MPI_Status status;
01000       const bool nEmpty = nodeList.empty();
01001 
01002       DendroIntL  off1= 0, off2= 0, localWt= 0, totalWt = 0;
01003 
01004       DendroIntL* wts = NULL;
01005       DendroIntL* lscn = NULL;
01006       DendroIntL nlSize = nodeList.size();
01007       if(nlSize) {
01008         wts = new DendroIntL[nlSize];
01009         assert(wts);
01010 
01011         lscn= new DendroIntL[nlSize]; 
01012         assert(lscn);
01013       }
01014 
01015       // First construct arrays of id and wts.
01016       for (DendroIntL i = 0; i < nlSize; i++) {
01017         wts[i] = (*getWeight)( &(nodeList[i]) );
01018         localWt += wts[i];
01019       }
01020 
01021 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01022       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01023       if(!rank) {
01024         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-1 passed."<<std::endl;
01025       }
01026       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01027 #endif
01028 
01029       // compute the total weight of the problem ...
01030       par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(&localWt, &totalWt, 1, MPI_SUM, comm);
01031 
01032       // perform a local scan on the weights first ...
01033       DendroIntL zero = 0;
01034       if(!nEmpty) {
01035         lscn[0]=wts[0];
01036         for (DendroIntL i = 1; i < nlSize; i++) {
01037           lscn[i] = wts[i] + lscn[i-1];
01038         }//end for
01039         // now scan with the final members of 
01040         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>(lscn+nlSize-1, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
01041       } else{
01042         par::Mpi_Scan<DendroIntL>(&zero, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
01043       }
01044 
01045       // communicate the offsets ...
01046       if (rank < (npes-1)){
01047         par::Mpi_Issend<DendroIntL>( &off1, 1, rank+1, 0, comm, &request );
01048       }
01049       if (rank){
01050         par::Mpi_Recv<DendroIntL>( &off2, 1, rank-1, 0, comm, &status );
01051       }
01052       else{
01053         off2 = 0; 
01054       }
01055 
01056       // add offset to local array
01057       for (DendroIntL i = 0; i < nlSize; i++) {
01058         lscn[i] = lscn[i] + off2;       // This has the global scan results now ...
01059       }//end for
01060 
01061 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01062       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01063       if(!rank) {
01064         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-2 passed."<<std::endl;
01065       }
01066       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01067 #endif
01068 
01069       int * sendSz = new int [npes];
01070       assert(sendSz);
01071 
01072       int * recvSz = new int [npes];
01073       assert(recvSz);
01074 
01075       int * sendOff = new int [npes]; 
01076       assert(sendOff);
01077       sendOff[0] = 0;
01078 
01079       int * recvOff = new int [npes]; 
01080       assert(recvOff);
01081       recvOff[0] = 0;
01082 
01083       // compute the partition offsets and sizes so that All2Allv can be performed.
01084       // initialize ...
01085 
01086       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01087         sendSz[i] = 0;
01088       }
01089 
01090       // Now determine the average load ...
01091       DendroIntL npesLong = npes;
01092       DendroIntL avgLoad = (totalWt/npesLong);
01093 
01094       DendroIntL extra = (totalWt%npesLong);
01095 
01096       //The Heart of the algorithm....
01097       if(avgLoad > 0) {
01098         for (DendroIntL i = 0; i < nlSize; i++) {
01099           if(lscn[i] == 0) {            
01100             sendSz[0]++;
01101           }else {
01102             int ind=0;
01103             if ( lscn[i] <= (extra*(avgLoad + 1)) ) {
01104               ind = ((lscn[i] - 1)/(avgLoad + 1));
01105             }else {
01106               ind = ((lscn[i] - (1 + extra))/avgLoad);
01107             }
01108             assert(ind < npes);
01109             sendSz[ind]++;
01110           }//end if-else
01111         }//end for 
01112       }else {
01113         sendSz[0]+= nlSize;
01114       }//end if-else
01115 
01116 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01117       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01118       if(!rank) {
01119         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-3 passed."<<std::endl;
01120       }
01121       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01122 #endif
01123 
01124       if(rank < (npes-1)) {
01125         MPI_Status statusWait;
01126         MPI_Wait(&request, &statusWait);
01127       }
01128 
01129       // communicate with other procs how many you shall be sending and get how
01130       // many to recieve from whom.
01131       par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendSz, recvSz, 1, comm);
01132 
01133 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01134       DendroIntL totSendToOthers = 0;
01135       DendroIntL totRecvFromOthers = 0;
01136       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01137         if(rank != i) {
01138           totSendToOthers += sendSz[i];
01139           totRecvFromOthers += recvSz[i];
01140         }
01141       }
01142 #endif
01143 
01144       DendroIntL nn=0; // new value of nlSize, ie the local nodes.
01145       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01146         nn += recvSz[i];
01147       }
01148 
01149       // compute offsets ...
01150       for (int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
01151         sendOff[i] = sendOff[i-1] + sendSz[i-1];
01152         recvOff[i] = recvOff[i-1] + recvSz[i-1];
01153       }
01154 
01155 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01156       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01157       if(!rank) {
01158         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-4 passed."<<std::endl;
01159       }
01160       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01161       /*
01162          std::cout<<rank<<": newSize: "<<nn<<" oldSize: "<<(nodeList.size())
01163          <<" send: "<<totSendToOthers<<" recv: "<<totRecvFromOthers<<std::endl;
01164        */
01165       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01166 #endif
01167 
01168       // allocate memory for the new arrays ...
01169       std::vector<T > newNodes(nn);
01170 
01171 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01172       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01173       if(!rank) {
01174         std::cout<<"Partition: Final alloc successful."<<std::endl;
01175       }
01176       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01177 #endif
01178 
01179       // perform All2All  ... 
01180       T* nodeListPtr = NULL;
01181       T* newNodesPtr = NULL;
01182       if(!nodeList.empty()) {
01183         nodeListPtr = &(*(nodeList.begin()));
01184       }
01185       if(!newNodes.empty()) {
01186         newNodesPtr = &(*(newNodes.begin()));
01187       }
01188       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<T>(nodeListPtr, sendSz, sendOff, 
01189           newNodesPtr, recvSz, recvOff, comm);
01190 
01191 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01192       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01193       if(!rank) {
01194         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-5 passed."<<std::endl;
01195       }
01196       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01197 #endif
01198 
01199       // reset the pointer ...
01200       nodeList = newNodes;
01201       newNodes.clear();
01202 
01203       // clean up...
01204       if(!nEmpty) {
01205         delete [] lscn;
01206         delete [] wts;
01207       }
01208       delete [] sendSz;
01209       sendSz = NULL;
01210 
01211       delete [] sendOff;
01212       sendOff = NULL;
01213 
01214       delete [] recvSz;
01215       recvSz = NULL;
01216 
01217       delete [] recvOff;
01218       recvOff = NULL;
01219 
01220 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01221       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01222       if(!rank) {
01223         std::cout<<"Partition: Stage-6 passed."<<std::endl;
01224       }
01225       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01226 #endif
01227 
01228       PROF_PARTW_END
01229     }//end function
01230 
01231   template<typename T>
01232     int removeDuplicates(std::vector<T>& vecT, bool isSorted, MPI_Comm comm){
01233 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
01234       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01235 #endif
01236       PROF_REMDUP_BEGIN
01237         int size, rank;
01238       MPI_Comm_size(comm,&size);
01239       MPI_Comm_rank(comm,&rank);
01240 
01241       std::vector<T> tmpVec;
01242       if(!isSorted) {           
01243         //Sort partitions vecT and tmpVec internally.
01244         par::sampleSort<T>(vecT, tmpVec, comm);                         
01245       }else {
01246         tmpVec = vecT;
01247       }
01248 
01249 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01250       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01251       if(!rank) {
01252         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-1 passed."<<std::endl;
01253       }
01254       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01255 #endif
01256 
01257       vecT.clear();
01258       par::partitionW<T>(tmpVec, NULL, comm);
01259 
01260 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01261       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01262       if(!rank) {
01263         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-2 passed."<<std::endl;
01264       }
01265       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01266 #endif
01267 
01268       //Remove duplicates locally
01269       seq::makeVectorUnique<T>(tmpVec,true); 
01270 
01271 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01272       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01273       if(!rank) {
01274         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-3 passed."<<std::endl;
01275       }
01276       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01277 #endif
01278 
01279       //Creating groups
01280 
01281       int new_rank, new_size; 
01282       MPI_Comm   new_comm;
01283       // very quick and dirty solution -- assert that tmpVec is non-emply at every processor (repetetive calls to splitComm2way exhaust MPI resources)
01284       // par::splitComm2way(tmpVec.empty(), &new_comm, comm);
01285       new_comm=comm;
01286       assert(!tmpVec.empty());
01287       MPI_Comm_rank (new_comm, &new_rank);
01288       MPI_Comm_size (new_comm, &new_size);
01289 
01290 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01291       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01292       if(!rank) {
01293         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-4 passed."<<std::endl;
01294       }
01295       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01296 #endif
01297 
01298       //Checking boundaries... 
01299       if(!tmpVec.empty()) {
01300         T end = tmpVec[tmpVec.size()-1];          
01301         T endRecv;
01302 
01303         //communicate end to the next processor.
01304         MPI_Status status;
01305 
01306         par::Mpi_Sendrecv<T, T>(&end, 1, ((new_rank <(new_size-1))?(new_rank+1):0), 1, &endRecv,
01307             1, ((new_rank > 0)?(new_rank-1):(new_size-1)), 1, new_comm, &status);
01308 
01309         //Remove endRecv if it exists (There can be no more than one copy of this)
01310         if(new_rank) {
01311           typename std::vector<T>::iterator Iter = find(tmpVec.begin(),tmpVec.end(),endRecv);
01312           if(Iter != tmpVec.end()) {
01313             tmpVec.erase(Iter);
01314           }//end if found    
01315         }//end if p not 0         
01316       }//end if not empty
01317 
01318 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01319       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01320       if(!rank) {
01321         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-5 passed."<<std::endl;
01322       }
01323       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01324 #endif
01325 
01326       vecT = tmpVec;
01327       tmpVec.clear();
01328       par::partitionW<T>(vecT, NULL, comm);
01329 
01330 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01331       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01332       if(!rank) {
01333         std::cout<<"RemDup: Stage-6 passed."<<std::endl;
01334       }
01335       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01336 #endif
01337 
01338       PROF_REMDUP_END
01339     }//end function
01340 
01341   template<typename T>
01342     int sampleSort(std::vector<T>& arr, std::vector<T> & SortedElem, MPI_Comm comm){ 
01343 #ifdef __PROFILE_WITH_BARRIER__
01344       MPI_Barrier(comm);
01345 #endif
01346       PROF_SORT_BEGIN
01347 
01348         int npes;
01349 
01350       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01351 
01352       if (npes == 1) {
01353         std::cout <<" have to use seq. sort"
01354           <<" since npes = 1 . inpSize: "<<(arr.size()) <<std::endl;
01355         std::sort(arr.begin(), arr.end());
01356         SortedElem  = arr;
01357         PROF_SORT_END
01358       } 
01359 
01360       std::vector<T>  splitters;
01361       std::vector<T>  allsplitters;
01362 
01363       int myrank;
01364       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &myrank);
01365 
01366       DendroIntL nelem = arr.size();
01367       DendroIntL nelemCopy = nelem;
01368       DendroIntL totSize;
01369       par::Mpi_Allreduce<DendroIntL>(&nelemCopy, &totSize, 1, MPI_SUM, comm);
01370 
01371       DendroIntL npesLong = npes;
01372       const DendroIntL FIVE = 5;
01373 
01374       if(totSize < (FIVE*npesLong*npesLong)) {
01375         if(!myrank) {
01376           std::cout <<" Using bitonic sort since totSize < (5*(npes^2)). totSize: "
01377             <<totSize<<" npes: "<<npes <<std::endl;
01378         }
01379         par::partitionW<T>(arr, NULL, comm);
01380 
01381 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01382         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01383         if(!myrank) {
01384           std::cout<<"SampleSort (small n): Stage-1 passed."<<std::endl;
01385         }
01386         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01387 #endif
01388 
01389         SortedElem = arr; 
01390         MPI_Comm new_comm;
01391         if(totSize < npesLong) {
01392           if(!myrank) {
01393             std::cout<<" Input to sort is small. splittingComm: "
01394               <<npes<<" -> "<< totSize<<std::endl;
01395           }
01396           par::splitCommUsingSplittingRank(static_cast<int>(totSize), &new_comm, comm);
01397         } else {
01398           new_comm = comm;
01399         }
01400 
01401 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01402         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01403         if(!myrank) {
01404           std::cout<<"SampleSort (small n): Stage-2 passed."<<std::endl;
01405         }
01406         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01407 #endif
01408 
01409         if(!SortedElem.empty()) {
01410           par::bitonicSort<T>(SortedElem, new_comm);
01411         }
01412 
01413 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01414         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01415         if(!myrank) {
01416           std::cout<<"SampleSort (small n): Stage-3 passed."<<std::endl;
01417         }
01418         MPI_Barrier(comm);
01419 #endif
01420 
01421         PROF_SORT_END
01422       }// end if
01423 
01424 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01425       if(!myrank) {
01426         std::cout<<"Using sample sort to sort nodes. n/p^2 is fine."<<std::endl;
01427       }
01428 #endif
01429 
01430       //Re-part arr so that each proc. has atleast p elements.
01431       par::partitionW<T>(arr, NULL, comm);
01432 
01433       nelem = arr.size();
01434 
01435       std::sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
01436 
01437       std::vector<T> sendSplits(npes-1);
01438       splitters.resize(npes);
01439 
01440       for(int i = 1; i < npes; i++)      {
01441         sendSplits[i-1] = arr[i*nelem/npes];    
01442       }//end for i
01443 
01444       // sort sendSplits using bitonic ...
01445       par::bitonicSort<T>(sendSplits,comm);
01446 
01447       // All gather with last element of splitters.
01448       T* sendSplitsPtr = NULL;
01449       T* splittersPtr = NULL;
01450       if(sendSplits.size() > static_cast<unsigned int>(npes-2)) {
01451         sendSplitsPtr = &(*(sendSplits.begin() + (npes -2)));
01452       }
01453       if(!splitters.empty()) {
01454         splittersPtr = &(*(splitters.begin()));
01455       }
01456       par::Mpi_Allgather<T>(sendSplitsPtr, splittersPtr, 1, comm);
01457 
01458       sendSplits.clear();
01459 
01460       int *sendcnts = new int[npes];
01461       assert(sendcnts);
01462 
01463       int * recvcnts = new int[npes];
01464       assert(recvcnts);
01465 
01466       int * sdispls = new int[npes];
01467       assert(sdispls);
01468 
01469       int * rdispls = new int[npes];
01470       assert(rdispls);
01471 
01472       for(int k = 0; k < npes; k++){
01473         sendcnts[k] = 0;
01474       }
01475 
01476       int k = 0;
01477 
01478       for (DendroIntL j = 0; j < nelem; j++) {
01479         if (arr[j] <= splitters[k]) {
01480           sendcnts[k]++;
01481         } else{
01482           k = seq::UpperBound<T>(npes-1, splittersPtr, k+1, arr[j]);
01483           if (k == (npes-1) ){
01484             //could not find any splitter >= arr[j]
01485             sendcnts[k] = (nelem - j);
01486             break;
01487           } else {
01488             assert(k < (npes-1));
01489             assert(splitters[k] >= arr[j]);
01490             sendcnts[k]++;
01491           }
01492         }//end if-else
01493       }//end for j
01494 
01495       par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendcnts, recvcnts, 1, comm);
01496 
01497       sdispls[0] = 0; rdispls[0] = 0;
01498       for (int j = 1; j < npes; j++){
01499         sdispls[j] = sdispls[j-1] + sendcnts[j-1];
01500         rdispls[j] = rdispls[j-1] + recvcnts[j-1];
01501       }
01502 
01503       DendroIntL nsorted = rdispls[npes-1] + recvcnts[npes-1];
01504       SortedElem.resize(nsorted);
01505 
01506       T* arrPtr = NULL;
01507       T* SortedElemPtr = NULL;
01508       if(!arr.empty()) {
01509         arrPtr = &(*(arr.begin()));
01510       }
01511       if(!SortedElem.empty()) {
01512         SortedElemPtr = &(*(SortedElem.begin()));
01513       }
01514       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_dense<T>(arrPtr, sendcnts, sdispls,
01515           SortedElemPtr, recvcnts, rdispls, comm);
01516 
01517       arr.clear();
01518 
01519       delete [] sendcnts;
01520       sendcnts = NULL;
01521 
01522       delete [] recvcnts;
01523       recvcnts = NULL;
01524 
01525       delete [] sdispls;
01526       sdispls = NULL;
01527 
01528       delete [] rdispls;
01529       rdispls = NULL;
01530 
01531       sort(SortedElem.begin(), SortedElem.end());
01532 
01533       PROF_SORT_END
01534     }//end function
01535 
01536   /********************************************************************/
01537   /*
01538    * which_keys is one of KEEP_HIGH or KEEP_LOW
01539    * partner    is the processor with which to Merge and Split.
01540    *
01541    */
01542   template <typename T>
01543     void MergeSplit( std::vector<T> &local_list, int which_keys, int partner, MPI_Comm  comm) {
01544 
01545       MPI_Status status;
01546       int send_size = local_list.size();
01547       int recv_size = 0;
01548 
01549       // first communicate how many you will send and how many you will receive ...
01550 
01551       par::Mpi_Sendrecv<int, int>( &send_size , 1, partner, 0,
01552           &recv_size, 1, partner, 0, comm, &status);
01553 
01554       std::vector<T> temp_list( recv_size );
01555 
01556       T* local_listPtr = NULL;
01557       T* temp_listPtr = NULL;
01558       if(!local_list.empty()) {
01559         local_listPtr = &(*(local_list.begin()));
01560       }
01561       if(!temp_list.empty()) {
01562         temp_listPtr = &(*(temp_list.begin()));
01563       }
01564 
01565       par::Mpi_Sendrecv<T, T>( local_listPtr, send_size, partner,
01566           1, temp_listPtr, recv_size, partner, 1, comm, &status);
01567 
01568       MergeLists<T>(local_list, temp_list, which_keys);
01569 
01570       temp_list.clear();
01571     } // Merge_split 
01572 
01573   template <typename T>
01574     void Par_bitonic_sort_incr( std::vector<T> &local_list, int proc_set_size, MPI_Comm  comm ) {
01575       int  eor_bit;
01576       int       proc_set_dim;
01577       int       stage;
01578       int       partner;
01579       int       my_rank;
01580 
01581       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &my_rank);
01582 
01583       proc_set_dim = 0;
01584       int x = proc_set_size;
01585       while (x > 1) {
01586         x = x >> 1;
01587         proc_set_dim++;
01588       }
01589 
01590       eor_bit = (1 << (proc_set_dim - 1) );
01591       for (stage = 0; stage < proc_set_dim; stage++) {
01592         partner = (my_rank ^ eor_bit);
01593 
01594         if (my_rank < partner) {
01595           MergeSplit<T> ( local_list,  KEEP_LOW, partner, comm);
01596         } else {
01597           MergeSplit<T> ( local_list, KEEP_HIGH, partner, comm);
01598         }
01599 
01600         eor_bit = (eor_bit >> 1);
01601       }
01602     }  // Par_bitonic_sort_incr 
01603 
01604 
01605   template <typename T>
01606     void Par_bitonic_sort_decr( std::vector<T> &local_list, int proc_set_size, MPI_Comm  comm) {
01607       int  eor_bit;
01608       int       proc_set_dim;
01609       int       stage;
01610       int       partner;
01611       int       my_rank;
01612 
01613       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &my_rank);
01614 
01615       proc_set_dim = 0;
01616       int x = proc_set_size;
01617       while (x > 1) {
01618         x = x >> 1;
01619         proc_set_dim++;
01620       }
01621 
01622       eor_bit = (1 << (proc_set_dim - 1));
01623       for (stage = 0; stage < proc_set_dim; stage++) {
01624         partner = my_rank ^ eor_bit;
01625 
01626         if (my_rank > partner) {
01627           MergeSplit<T> ( local_list,  KEEP_LOW, partner, comm);
01628         } else {
01629           MergeSplit<T> ( local_list, KEEP_HIGH, partner, comm);
01630         }
01631 
01632         eor_bit = (eor_bit >> 1);
01633       }
01634 
01635     } // Par_bitonic_sort_decr 
01636 
01637   template <typename T>
01638     void Par_bitonic_merge_incr( std::vector<T> &local_list, int proc_set_size, MPI_Comm  comm ) {
01639       int       partner;
01640       int       rank, npes;
01641 
01642       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01643       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01644 
01645       unsigned int num_left  =  binOp::getPrevHighestPowerOfTwo(npes);
01646       unsigned int num_right = npes - num_left;
01647 
01648       // 1, Do merge between the k right procs and the highest k left procs.
01649       if ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) < num_left) &&
01650           (static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) >= (num_left - num_right)) ) {
01651         partner = static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) + num_right;
01652         MergeSplit<T> ( local_list,  KEEP_LOW, partner, comm);
01653       } else if (static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) >= num_left) {
01654         partner = static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) - num_right;
01655         MergeSplit<T> ( local_list,  KEEP_HIGH, partner, comm);
01656       }
01657     }
01658 
01659   template <typename T>
01660     void bitonicSort_binary(std::vector<T> & in, MPI_Comm comm) {
01661       int                   proc_set_size;
01662       unsigned int          and_bit;
01663       int               rank;
01664       int               npes;
01665 
01666       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01667 
01668 #ifdef __DEBUG_PAR__
01669       assert(npes > 1);
01670       assert(!(npes & (npes-1)));
01671       assert(!(in.empty()));
01672 #endif
01673 
01674       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01675 
01676       for (proc_set_size = 2, and_bit = 2;
01677           proc_set_size <= npes;
01678           proc_set_size = proc_set_size*2, 
01679           and_bit = and_bit << 1) {
01680 
01681         if ((rank & and_bit) == 0) {
01682           Par_bitonic_sort_incr<T>( in, proc_set_size, comm);
01683         } else {
01684           Par_bitonic_sort_decr<T>( in, proc_set_size, comm);
01685         }
01686       }//end for
01687     }
01688 
01689   template <typename T>
01690     void bitonicSort(std::vector<T> & in, MPI_Comm comm) {
01691       int               rank;
01692       int               npes;
01693 
01694       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01695       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01696 
01697       assert(!(in.empty()));
01698 
01699       //Local Sort first
01700       std::sort(in.begin(),in.end());
01701 
01702       if(npes > 1) {
01703 
01704         // check if npes is a power of two ...
01705         bool isPower = (!(npes & (npes - 1)));
01706 
01707         if ( isPower ) {
01708           bitonicSort_binary<T>(in, comm);
01709         } else {
01710           MPI_Comm new_comm;
01711 
01712           // Since npes is not a power of two, we shall split the problem in two ...
01713           //
01714           // 1. Create 2 comm groups ... one for the 2^d portion and one for the
01715           // remainder.
01716           unsigned int splitter = splitCommBinary(comm, &new_comm);
01717 
01718           if ( static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) < splitter) {
01719             bitonicSort_binary<T>(in, new_comm);
01720           } else {
01721             bitonicSort<T>(in, new_comm);
01722           }
01723 
01724           // 3. Do a special merge of the two segments. (original comm).
01725           Par_bitonic_merge_incr( in,  binOp::getNextHighestPowerOfTwo(npes), comm );
01726 
01727           splitter = splitCommBinaryNoFlip(comm, &new_comm);
01728 
01729           // 4. Now a final sort on the segments.
01730           if (static_cast<unsigned int>(rank) < splitter) {
01731             bitonicSort_binary<T>(in, new_comm);
01732           } else {
01733             bitonicSort<T>(in, new_comm);
01734           }
01735         }//end if isPower of 2
01736       }//end if single processor
01737     }//end function
01738 
01739   template <typename T>
01740     void MergeLists( std::vector<T> &listA, std::vector<T> &listB,
01741         int KEEP_WHAT) {
01742 
01743       T _low, _high;
01744 
01745       assert(!(listA.empty()));
01746       assert(!(listB.empty()));
01747 
01748       _low  = ( (listA[0] > listB[0]) ? listA[0] : listB[0]);
01749       _high = ( (listA[listA.size()-1] < listB[listB.size()-1]) ?
01750           listA[listA.size()-1] : listB[listB.size()-1]);
01751 
01752       // We will do a full merge first ...
01753       unsigned int list_size = static_cast<unsigned int>(listA.size() + listB.size());
01754 
01755       std::vector<T> scratch_list(list_size);
01756 
01757       unsigned int  index1 = 0;
01758       unsigned int  index2 = 0; 
01759 
01760       for (int i = 0; i < list_size; i++) {
01761         //The order of (A || B) is important here, 
01762         //so that index2 remains within bounds
01763         if ( (index1 < listA.size()) && 
01764             ( (index2 >= listB.size()) ||
01765               (listA[index1] <= listB[index2]) ) ) {
01766           scratch_list[i] = listA[index1];
01767           index1++;
01768         } else {
01769           scratch_list[i] = listB[index2];
01770           index2++;     
01771         }
01772       }
01773 
01774       //Scratch list is sorted at this point.
01775 
01776       listA.clear();
01777       listB.clear();
01778       if ( KEEP_WHAT == KEEP_LOW ) {
01779         int ii=0;
01780         while ( ( (scratch_list[ii] < _low) ||
01781               (ii < (list_size/2)) )
01782             && (scratch_list[ii] <= _high) ) {
01783           ii++; 
01784         }
01785         if(ii) {
01786           listA.insert(listA.end(), scratch_list.begin(),
01787               (scratch_list.begin() + ii));
01788         }
01789       } else {
01790         int ii = (list_size - 1);
01791         while ( ( (ii >= (list_size/2)) 
01792               && (scratch_list[ii] >= _low) )
01793             || (scratch_list[ii] > _high) ) {
01794           ii--; 
01795         }
01796         if(ii < (list_size - 1) ) {
01797           listA.insert(listA.begin(), (scratch_list.begin() + (ii + 1)),
01798               (scratch_list.begin() + list_size));
01799         }
01800       }
01801       scratch_list.clear();
01802     }//end function
01803 
01804 }//end namespace
